授業方法:
The class will consists of lectures, small group discussion, writing assignments, videos, and handouts.
Classes are conducted face-to-face in the classroom.
The online class participants will receive both simultaneous online interactive delivery during class time and on-demand materials.

第2回: Writing assignment: Describe your political philosophy.
第4回: Writing assignment: Describe your country's government structure.
第7回: Political Parties, Special Interests, and Political Campaigns
第9回: Mock Hearing: Students will present testimony for or against a bill.
第10回: Mock Hearing: Students will present testimony for or against a bill.
第11回: Power to the People: The Role of Community Organizing in Politics.
第12回: The Haves and the Have Nots: The Role of Class in Politics.
第13回: The Future of Democracy in a Flat World: The Role of Globalization in Politics.
